content: Hi all. Where can I find the documentation of the lean 4's builtin functions and also the external standard library (v4) ? Is there something like hackage (Haskell) for lean ? What about searching for functions like hoogle for haskell ? Thanks
docs4#Nat and no we dont have hoogle yet but the site has a search functionality
Thanks ! That link is the community site, is that the main documentation site ?
Is there documentation also for tactics? When I search for "Simp" I don't find it in the docs. thanks!
